ComicInfo.Summary: A massive gathering of heroes take on the supremely powerful Omnipotus, forcing him back through a portal. Out on the Mantis planet, Mark and his Father have a long talk that gets interrupted by three attacking Viltrumites. Features a Capes backup story.
